title: Mini-Ep 107: Bronzers and Birthdays
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 107: Bronzers and Birthdays
itunes:subtitle: On this mini-episode, Kate and Doree hear a different perspective on toxic friends, wonder which self-tanner is the best to fake a tan, discuss quarantine birthday ideas, and learn what yoga toes are really doing for our feet. We love to he...
description:
On this mini-episode, Kate and Doree hear a different perspective on toxic friends, wonder which self-tanner is the best to fake a tan, discuss quarantine birthday ideas, and learn what yoga toes are really doing for our feet. 


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35.
  • BOMBAS - For 20% off your first purchase of Bombas, visit bombas.com/FOREVER53.
  • MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.
  • TALKSPACE - Get your first week free of Talkspace when you visit talkspace.com use promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.
